document.full_text: authorities asked for the public's help on thursday in locating a gray-haired man caught on surveillance videos and sought in the investigation of a homemade bomb planted at a shopping mall near columbine high school.
document.title: man sought in probe of mall bomb found near columbine
lines_and_colors: authorities asked for the public's help on thursday in locating a gray-haired man caught on surveillance videos and sought in the investigation of a homemade bomb planted at a shopping mall near columbine high school.
